Clovis.McLane High School:
McLane High School (Fresno Unified School District) is a 9-12 public high school in Fresno, California, United States, located at the corner of Cedar and Clinton.


== Programs and activities ==
AVID (Advance Via Individual Determination) is a program at McLane that helps students be organized and prepares them for college. AVID is a community support system which provides tutoring, career planning and mentoring.
